website_summaries.verdict: A basic, no-frills selfie stick at an appealing price.
pros: Includes wrist strap and adjustable head for angle variety
Built-in Bluetooth control with decent battery life
Excellent functionality at an attractive price
cons: Could do with a bit of added length

customer_reviews.title: It'sa winner
customer_reviews.text: Even I could make it work and I took the nicest picture of myself in fifty years.
customer_reviews.author: Norel Pride

customer_reviews.title: perfect! The first shot I tried I couldn't see ...
customer_reviews.text: simple, effective and inexpensive. perfect! The first shot I tried I couldn't see my screen because it was very bright and sunny out but my husband was laughing and telling me to keep shooting because my doberman had come up behind me and saw my phone (which is usually pointed at him) and he stopped and posed with me. Hilarious.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SELFIE STICK!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this product its my second time purchasing. I went to London with the very first one and my cousin fell in love with it and it didn't came back to the US with me. It was perfect taking pictures at the Musse De Louvre...Eiffel Tower........#Paris2017
customer_reviews.author: Syreeta Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Great product! user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Great product! user friendly! I took it to an engagement party and everyone loved it! only down side(not sure if this is for all bluetooth selfie sticks) is that if someone else wants to use it with their phone you have to remember to disconnect in order for them to pick the bluetooth up.
customer_reviews.author: 89Sun_baby

customer_reviews.title: Great for Vacation
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take pictures with my boyfriend when we went on vacation. It worked great, the only thing that sucked was it didn't come charged so you might want to charge it before you leave.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: The best invention ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my selfie stick!!!! I love everything about my selfie stick. Handy, convenient, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Williams Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Took to Hawaii. Never had a problem connecting to phone. This is a very durable product. I have gone through 2 other selfie sticks and they broke quite easily. This seems more substantial and easy to connect and use. Never had to charge during our week visit there.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E Williams

customer_reviews.title: Selfie king
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! We took it to a music festival in Chicago and got a ton of use out of it. It fit great in my fannypack and synced nicely with my Google Pixel. Bluetooth was surprisingly dependable. Great buy for only 10 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Selfie Stick
customer_reviews.text: This is a great selfie stick. Collapses nice and small to fit in any handbag. Easy to use, even for someone a bit untechy. I write a blog and need to take pictures from time to time and this allows me to get good angles very quickly. Don't think these are just for kids! Everybody gets better pics with these - so if you're going on a family trip or anything, stash this in your bag so you can get a picture that shows more background than you can get otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: I Spy Fabulous

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, stylish, light, compact and works seamlessly
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, stylish, light, compact and works seamlessly. Used for Samsung Galaxy Note 4 Edge, holder extends to fit the phone fully cased, stick sturdy even when filly extended with phone attached, swivel horizontally, folds compactly and fits in pocket/bag. Bluetooth pairing was seamless as well as snaps.
customer_reviews.author: RDUMan

customer_reviews.title: Update. Not for Samsung Galaxy 10
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, but does not work with galaxy s 10. unfortunately after getting my new phone, my Mpow selfie stick won't pair. So my selfie fun is over as quickly as it began. I bought this to end my "big head" in group pics as I was the one taking them. This fits easily in my purse and was easy to set up. Just charge it, find you bluetooth on the phone and pair by pressing the camera button on the stick for 3 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Adam and Dominika (family account)

customer_reviews.title: Warning...Don’t buy it. Doesn’t Work.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a a joke and waste of money. I wish I had listen to the people who gave it a similar review. I even tried giving a chance to the seller to send me a different one or refund my money but they did not even bothered to reply. It doesn’t hold a charge for even 5 Minutes. Bought to take selfies with my wife on a vacation and it didn’t work...I hate this product.
customer_reviews.author: Flatout

customer_reviews.title: Valuable Selfie Tool
customer_reviews.text: This selfie stick is a must have! Some people use a selfie stick on vacations or for trips, but I use mine at home all the time! It’s so convenient and practical, everyone should own one! Don’t we take selfies everyday throughout the day all the time? And sometimes it’s challenging taking selfies, but Mpow Selfie Stick makes taking selfies so easy and convenient. It’s a very inexpensive tool that you will enjoy daily. My favorite selfies are with my four-legged baby boy!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Useful and Great Costumer Service
customer_reviews.text: Update:1/20/19 After writing this review the product sellers reached out to me fairly quick for a replacement selfie stick at no charge. It arrived within a couple of days due to the holidays. They were friendly, efficient, and gave great customer service! Overall was pretty useful for our trip. Only lasted about a week. The charger port got pushed in while trying to charge. Other then that it was pretty cool. Also battery life is fairly short but I wasn’t expecting too much of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. I had always wondered if a selfie stick would be handy and I've already used it a number of times -- not only for selfies, but also for doing a group FaceTime call -- everyone can get in the pic! This is so much better than a hard wired device and battery life seems great so far.
customer_reviews.author: ctm

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging after a year; Edit: Got replacement, works great!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this selfie stick until it suddenly stopped charging while I was on vacation recently. I only use it on vacations, so at most I've used it for maybe 4 weeks in the past year. I left it plugged in overnight but I cannot get a blue or red light to come on again. Disappointed it stopped working, I really enjoyed the product until now! Edit: Customer service sent replacement that works great! Haven't had repeat problem since
customer_reviews.author: perr

customer_reviews.title: Durable selfie stick
customer_reviews.text: This is the best selfie stick out there and I hate selfie sticks. It’s very durable & I actually use it to film video, so I bought 2.
customer_reviews.author: ButtcrackOfAmerica

customer_reviews.title: I got this and now I can take the pics myself and the kids love it too
customer_reviews.text: So i am NOT a social media person but I realized that I have zero pictures of my kids and me and every mother's day I ask for a picture to be taken of just me and the kids but it never seemed to happen. I got this and now I can take the pics myself and the kids love it too. Also take on trips! Charges well and holds charge for a good bit. It is sturdy and substantial- not cheap at all. I was super reluctant about buying this but it has paid for itself a million times over.
customer_reviews.author: KSSC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this (12/2018) to be an Iphone handle for taking lots of real estate work photos (400 at a time and within an hour). I telescoped it down to the minimum (about 7" (except for the phone holder part) and less than 1" thick) and it works great. There was a small amout of wobble that i corrected with electrical tape, but that was no big deal. linking it to the iphone was very easy. The rubber coated and spring loaded phone holder gizmo is very secure. No chance of the phone falling off on its own. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product! My audio jack is broken on my phone, and the blue tooth serves its purpose. I have a large phone, and it fits snug in the holder, and there’s a knob you can adjust for the angle that you want. The pole extends pretty far, which makes certain angles nice for photos. It folds up pretty compact, which makes carrying around easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Great Selfie Stick
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn't care for was the size of the print in the small instruction pamphlet that was included with the stick. I had to use a magnifying glass on how to setup and use the stick. Perhaps you can do something about getting a bigger print?? Other than that, I love it!! I've gotten so many great pics on my vacation --- couldn't have done it without the Mpow Selfie Stick!
customer_reviews.author: Creekvue

customer_reviews.title: Works great, zero issues
customer_reviews.text: Selfie stick worked great on 7-day Western Caribbean cruise. I forgot I had it many times, so I could have used it more. When I did use it, no issues. Bluetooth connection was a breeze, photos were taken and saved properly, and the stick went to standby/turned off on its own like it should. No complaints with operation, and really no pointers to improve it. Build construction feels sturdy and the telescoping portion is beefy. No worries that it will bend or break when extending or retracting. Overall, very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Pidasso

customer_reviews.title: Seller stands by their product
customer_reviews.text: Update: this seller sent a brand new selfie stick and I couldn’t be happier. The new stick works great and I have changed my opinion on this seller. I would suggest this product not be purchased. I bought two of them and one of them has stopped taking a charge. When I contacted the manufacturer, they said they couldn't help me and told me to contact the seller. When I contacted the seller (Woot), they told me to contact Amazon. Classic runaround. All I asked both the manufacturer and the seller was how do I go about getting this repaired. I wasn't looking for a new one as I bought this 2 years ago
customer_reviews.author: Peter Wernersbach

customer_reviews.title: However on my last trip to Italy while the selfie stick itself didn't break down and was fine, the micro USB connector was messe
customer_reviews.text: Well the truth is it lasted for 2 or 3 full uses on vacation and was convenient. However on my last trip to Italy while the selfie stick itself didn't break down and was fine, the micro USB connector was messed up and slid inside the stick so there was no way to charge it which renders it totally useless. Before this debacle I would have given it a better review, but if it isn't serving its purpose after very few uses, it deserves a 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Ellicottvic

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe I actually bought a selfie stick
customer_reviews.text: I finally broke down and bought a selfie stick why, well we wanted to take family pictures at Christmas and this way everyone can be in the picture. This stick is easy to use and folds up for easy storage and for packing it away when traveling. The wrist band is nice and the capture button is easy to use. This stick pairs easily with my phone and set up was quick and easy. Would recommend to anyone looking to buy a selfie stick.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware- no returns/refunds. I was sold a lemon
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The company actually shipped me a replacement at no charge and it works wonderfully. They provided great customer service and its a good product. Turned my 1 star review into a 5 star. Thanks for taking care of your customers BUYER BEWARE- this product may work for some people but I was sent a complete lemon. And there are NO REFUNDS! Won't charge, won't connect to my phone, won't do anything! The LED won't even light up. Completely dead. Useless
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is not the first selfie stick I have owned. But this is by far the best one I have purchased. I have an iPhone 11 Pro Max. My phone is big and has some weight to it. Most selfie sticks I would buy were too flimsy and would break or not be able to hold my phone still. This selfie stick is awesome. It’s thick and solid. Has no issue supporting the weight of my phone. Would highly recommend this brand to anyone who is in need of a selfie stick. It was also super easy to sync up with my phone. Took less then 6 seconds! Great product. Great packing and speedy shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Dez Collins

customer_reviews.title: My First Selfie (Stick)
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm👌🏽 when it comes to getting a full group picture with your friends!
customer_reviews.author: Tye Trent

customer_reviews.title: Selfie Stick Convert
customer_reviews.text: I hated the idea of selfie sticks when they first came out...but after about a year of reaistance I finally broke down. I'm glad I did, and this was a great choice. No cord needed as it connects via Bluetooth to my iPhone easy. I didn't want to pay $25 for one at Target, so I tried this one and I love it. I get better group pictures and I can stop trying to train my dog to use my camera. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: works well, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I refunded this item because it didn't really work. I bought this for my mom and she only got to use it maybe three times all together. The red charging light comes on but disappears quickly (maybe done charging?), but the blue light won't come one/won't turn on or connect. A few days after, the patozon customer service reached out to me. It turns there was something wrong with the product I had received they offered me a new selfie stick free of charge to try. Now it charges and works just fine and my mom is very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked and connected well, but almost too light-weight
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a trip to Hawaii - I thought I'd never purchase a selfie stick (I'm a photographer, so I never saw the need and always though I'd never be one of 'those people'), but I wanted to be able to get some great Hawaiian scenery in the background for those selfies with my husband. This worked pretty well and I didn't have any issues connecting it to my Samsung Galaxy S9+. My only complaint is that it almost seemed too flimsy for my piece-of-mind to really hold the S9+ securely. It held, don't get me wrong, but it always felt as though the phone was just too heavy for this light-way selfie stick.
customer_reviews.author: JLovesBooks

customer_reviews.title: Winner Here
customer_reviews.text: The BlueTooth set-up was easy on my Motorola phone and the stick button snaps photos/videos perfectly. Viewing angle adjustment is easy with snug adjustment and the telescoping is tight. This stick won't be loosening up anywhere any time soon. The latching mechanism that secures my phone takes a little getting used to but it definitely hugs my phablet securely. The jaws open just under 3-1/2 inches wide, so make sure they will accomodate your device. Collapsi-bility is outstanding and makes for a very compact design...js
customer_reviews.author: JFSAZ

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My children are embarrassed that I bought a selfie stick, but I love it. It is very compact...it fits nicely in my crossbody purse. I just take it out of my purse, attach my phone to it, arrange it to the legnth and angle I need, then make sure it is paired with my bluetooth on the phone, then push the button on the handle. It is well constructed. I'm not sure how long the battery last. I charged it when I received it before Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: AvoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Returning no use
customer_reviews.text: Definitely returning this. Piece of junk, don't work without the charger plug in. As soon as I plug out it's off. Kmt so disappointed. Been charging for 12 hrs straight n still not charged.
customer_reviews.author: Happy face

customer_reviews.title: awesome !!
customer_reviews.text: this thing is great !! I was against the selfie thing but i'll tell ya, this is better than sliced bread !! it arrived quickly. I plugged it in and charged it up. it took just a minute to sync to my phone. it also synced to my friend's phone so either of us could use it. it extends easily. i'm the person who always though the phone would fall out of these. but it's like spring loaded and you slip your phone in and voila. it holds it SO TIGHT!! it does drain your phone battery quickly. folds up compactly to carry in your purse.
customer_reviews.author: Red 4rd

customer_reviews.title: Great Selfie Stick!
customer_reviews.text: This selfie stick works great. I got it and the very first time I used it worked out great for what I use it for (taking pictures of my chihuahua). He was not liking me trying to take pics of him on my lap just an arm length away but with the selfie stick he isn't as scared and pretty much always looks straight into the camera/phone so I can get a great selfie almost every time.
customer_reviews.author: T.Pence

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lot of fun to play with ever since j bought it! I have gotten some great pics of my whole family and relatives over Christmas and lots of trips in the jeep ice fishing, sledding, and off road driving. I have had zero problems with it. It fits my phone perfect even though it's an I phone 6 with a pretty big life proof charging case. Also I love the color I have the pink one. Easy to use and fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cannot return it and it isn’t good
customer_reviews.text: Saw all the good reviews and ordered. The mechanism that holds the phone doesn’t adjust fully or swivel correctly which makes it difficult to nicely take a vertical selfie. Not happy, cannot return. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Twiggle

customer_reviews.title: Strange malfunction/cannot be replaced or returned
customer_reviews.text: Had this for two days. Second day it would not power off. It stays on till the battery dies no matter what. On/off function stopped working completely. I tried to have it replaced and it is not eligible for return even though it's a prime item.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Worked with my iPhone XR
customer_reviews.text: Works well with my iPhone XR. Wasn’t initially sure how to make it work, but I also didn’t read any directions, so the info may be in the box somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: samantha shimp

customer_reviews.title: Warranty, mehhhhh
customer_reviews.text: The stick worked great while it lasted. Then it died after 8 months. I contacted Mpow but they refused to acknowledge my purchase despite sending them the invoice. World famous 18-month warranty my ass. UPDATE: I contacted Amazon about this and immediately got an apology and received a refund. Now that is what I call world famous.
customer_reviews.author: swys

customer_reviews.title: Good Selfie Stick. Better Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Seems durable. Holds the iPhone X nicely, but that’s about it. Fully charged phone and selfie stick- constantly loses Bluetooth connectivity. Tried connecting to 3 separate iPhone X’s. Won’t stay connected. Update- original stick didn't stay connected. Customer Service reached out and sent a replacement. Tried out once so far, and stayed connected this time.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: May Explode or cause fire?
customer_reviews.text: It came with a warning label inside the box, and I quote: "Important Prompt! The product can be charged by 5v chargers/USB ports only. Adapters over 5v such as Quick chargers are not allowed, which may cause fire or explosion." Uh.... what?? We have many "fast" USB chargers that we use for our phones and the last thing we want to worry about it is plugging it into a fast adapter without thinking (who would expect it to explode?) and burning down our house. Amazon was great and gave us our money back. I'm going to buy one that uses a replaceable button battery instead.
customer_reviews.author: DDT

customer_reviews.title: perfect !!️
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, paired with my iPhone fast , it’s a great product !!️!!️
customer_reviews.author: shamese

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a terrible purchase. There must be a lot of fictitious positive reviews. Took on a recent trip and it did not pair with 2 different iPhones. Frustrating when on vacation and attempting to take pictures of a lifetime. This is a defective piece of junk. IT CANNOT BE RETURNED. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS SELFIE STICK!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott S

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product
customer_reviews.text: Guys this one is not a wonderful product, the first day the Springs holding the retention for the phone one of them came out. Within the first month the batteries would no longer hold a charge that item is useless. It is not a quality built item. So if you're looking for something that you might use more than one or two times find something else. The overall design was very promising it looked like it could be a very useful tool if it were not for the poor quality it probably would have been. That's the only reason I gave it two stars because of the design.
customer_reviews.author: David D

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as I was hoping; not for pop socket lovers!
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this selfie stick, but unfortunately the design of this one conflicts with my pop-socket. As a result, I’m really nervous about hoisting my phone too far into the air. It doesn’t feel super secure, and I’m not confident it won’t come tumbling back out. When I’m standing over the Oregon coast, that’s not a great feeling! The Bluetooth communication works ok, but it can have a delay that results in eyes half open or someone’s mouth moving. It’s great for the added height but I definitely find myself leaving it behind.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A

customer_reviews.title: No good for me
customer_reviews.text: Got it working for my S4 mini but then the shutter button for the video mode stopped working shortly after. Brought the issue to the attention of the vendor and they promptly sent a replacement but that did not work at all. Maybe for 8 bucks shouldn't expect much but reviews were pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Longvista

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth won’t stay connected
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a good idea but it doesn’t work and I can’t return it at this point. My bad for not checking it out right away. The bluetooth connects and then drops after about 30-seconds. The only thing consistent about this stick is that it doesn’t work. I bought it about a year ago and only tried to use it recently. It charged up fine and seem like it should work according to the Youtube videos but doesn’t. Also, the detailed instructions included in the videos was not the one I got. I small piece of paper with minimal information. Then again, how tough can it be to use a selfie stick so it shouldn’t need in depth instruction.
customer_reviews.author: Bart C. - Phoenix, AZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and it works really great as well.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and great selfie stick!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to pair my Mpow selfie stick with my iPhone 8 and it will not pair. I tried to return the item, but the selfie sticks can’t be returned. Getting ready to go on vacation and I am very disappointed with the product! Revision: Mpow got in touch with me and sent a new selfie stick. It works great and the customer service is even better! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie B.

customer_reviews.title: Good potential but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with purchase. I had bought this for a trip - charged once and worked well briefly. Battery ran down and when attempting to recharge, it appears there is now a short somewhere in the charger base of the stick. The red light briefly flickers on when plugged in but disappears with the slightest movement of the cord or stick. I unfortunately could not find a position where the charging would continue. In addition to cord provided, I tried one of my own cords with same connector piece (that I know works on other products) without success. Would not buy again based on this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Edit: The company must have seen my review and replaced my selfie stick. It works great. Thank you so much! The metal extender (the rod itself) is very loose/flimsy- the weight of the phone causes the rod to twist from side to side while you're trying to get a good angle for a picture or video. We could make it work to take pictures with, but my daughter wanted this to make videos with and there's no way you can take a video with the phone flopping around so much. Otherwise it would be a nice product- the phone fits nicely in the clamp, the bluetooth connectivity is good.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Perry

customer_reviews.title: Selfie Stick
customer_reviews.text: The problem with this selfie stick: the battery runs down after taking three or four pics. Therefore, it is not very practical to take while out sightseeing. I purchased it because I was going to NYC for my birthday weekend. And, as it turned, I was very disappointed with the selfie stick. On a positive note: The pictures that I took came out fine. However, the battery life is too short.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited to set this up for my mother for her vacation with friends...unfortunately it does not even charge. Out of the box this thing was defective. Whenever I plug in the USB to charge the red light stays on for maybe 2min and shuts off...doesn't indicate a full charge which would be a white light...I get NO lights. I figured I'd see if it would even connect to the phone. Nope. Im assuming the charge isn't enough...which there lies my problem. It won't charge. I don't recommend this unless you like gambling. This is a NON RETURNABLE item, as well. BE CAREFUL. I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Hartman

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WORK!!.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunatelly it is now to late to request a change or a refund(I had“to much stuff in my hands” to request it at that time) but I could never get this to work properlly...if I was lucky(now and again) to get it to connect to my iPhone’s Bluetooth, it would not react at all when pressing button to take pictures or videos. Total flop!...
customer_reviews.author: Martin M.

customer_reviews.title: What a waste
customer_reviews.text: I bought 10 of these for a wedding. I went to charge them up for the guests a few weeks prior.....only one of ten charged and worked as a bluetooth capable device. I left them on chargers overnight and the red light never turned off, as indicated in the instructions. Don't waste your money if you want a bluetooth option. Too late for my wedding I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Battery didn't charge
customer_reviews.text: The selfie stick that I received didn't work. The charging didn't work. Red light continued to go away and not charge. Couldn't use but customer service was great and refunded my money. Thank you amazon
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Forzaglia

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE WITH NO RETURN A WEEK LATER
customer_reviews.text: The item came but the plug to use it doesn't fit. I went to get a replacement a week later and there is no return. So they can sell defective items all day long and you can't return it. It's only 10 bucks but its the principle of the situation.
customer_reviews.author: RunRaeRae

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working on vacation
customer_reviews.text: As long as I was in my living room, it worked but it just stopped working on vacation. I do not recommend this product. And I cannot get an option to return from seller.
customer_reviews.author: BADancer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchase a selfie stick so that I can have it to take pictures by anniversary weekend, the Bluetooth never connected to my phone the remote control never worked I was still able to use the selfie stick itself I just had to program my phone to auto flash to take pictures but I wanted to take pictures of me and my husband for the whole weekend with both of us in the shot, so I really needed the Bluetooth phone so yes I was very disappointed to say the least but I'm still able to use the stick itself
customer_reviews.author: TCooper

customer_reviews.title: Adequate, not great
customer_reviews.text: Would not samsung note 9 with case on it, just needed a bit more stretch. You have to manually stretch it open, a two handed job requiring dexterity, imo. I can't speak for most of its other functions except it paired with no effort. It was a bit wobbly at the base--that was a big dissatisfied. I gave it away.
customer_reviews.author: SophieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Flash Selfie Stick Is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I use my selfie stick daily and highly recommend the Mpow model with flash! It grips my iPhone 11 tightly, is rechargable, has a tripod for hands free shots, and is lightweight. I've tried 3 selfie sticks trying to get these features and am happy Mpow sent this one to me :)
customer_reviews.author: Larissa Huffman

customer_reviews.title: It broke the first time I tried to charge it
customer_reviews.text: The selfie stick worked fine with my S7, but the first time I went to charge it, the charger port on the stick broke free of the plastic (it pushed inside the handle) and now I can not charge the device. I wish I could return it but the return window has closed by 9 days :(
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month.
customer_reviews.text: The unit worked well when I first received it. But a month or so later, the Bluetooth would not connect. I was frustrated so I threw it away. Later, I contacted the seller simply to let them know what happened. I did not ask for a replacement. However, they contacted me and offered me a free replacement even though I’d thrown mine away. I thought that was quite generous. But....they never sent the replacement. Oh well. I’ll buy a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Charging, then got replacement; replacement phone holder part broke!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for over a year for travel pics with no problem. Then on a recent trip the bottom rubber mount came unglued and then the stick would no longer charge at all. Had to buy a non Bluetooth cheap stick in South America. Disappointed in this product! Update: after above post, Mpow quickly honored their warranty and sent me a replacement! New update: while traveling and using the selfie stick, the part that that holds my iPhone Max broke In two making the product unusable. This is the 2nd time this has happened. Time to try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with my IPhone X
customer_reviews.text: First, I’d like to say that I really liked this design. It feels sturdy, collapses down to a very compact size and the quick release phone holder worked great. I never thought for a second that my IPhone X would fall out of the holder or that the stick would break while I was using it. Sadly, contrary to the headline of the product, the Bluetooth connectivity didn’t work the way I was expecting it to. Whenever I pressed the picture button on the handle, my volume would toggle up, not take a picture or start/stop a video recording.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Blas

customer_reviews.title: Not steady at all!
customer_reviews.text: I have been happy with my Mpow purchases until this one. I am very disappointed in the quality of this selfie stick. It is not sturdy and “bounces” without my phone- I feel like it will snap if I used my phone with it. Unf
customer_reviews.author: Sabs

customer_reviews.title: Died and doesn’t work after 9 months.
customer_reviews.text: Mine is Less than a year old and it died. Doesn’t charge up. . It has a warranty but not dealing with the hassle. Don’t waste your money and get a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Veg Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Cheap broken 1 day
customer_reviews.text: The lock to extend broken for 1 day of use also the bottom part turns its loose.. don't recomend this because they wint accept return
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: The selfie stick is not return eligible and I received a defective device.
customer_reviews.text: The selfie stick that I received was defective and would not charge. Unfortunately it’s not return eligible. But after I emailed Amazon Customer Service they refunded my money and instructed me to discard the defective item.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea. Have Huawei mate 9
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea. Have Huawei mate 9. A bit hard stretching to get phone in. Nice extension. My one complaint is the charge doesn't last but a day it seems, that is with just taking a couple pics. Go to use next day and it needs recharged. Can't use until charged. Maybe if it came with a longer charging cable then I could move around more taking pictures. Not! Company suggested trying a new cable instead of new one that came with item have only used item maybe 6 times. Seems now I can't get it to work with camera even though Bluetooth is connected.
customer_reviews.author: Sheber

customer_reviews.title: Android will only zoom... FIXED!
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough quality BUT the button ONLY zooms in when paired with Android phones. And it cannot be changed. How would they not be aware of that fact? Also, the blue is not aluminum if you think so, it is also plastic. UPDATE: it turns out the issue in Androids can be fixes in the... Camera settings / shooting methods / press volume key - set this to "take pict or record video" fixed!
customer_reviews.author: Lock-N-Load

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this. It’s worthless. IF I get it to pair with my phone, the connection doesn’t hold. And it loses its charge quickly. I’ve not successfully taken one photo with it.
customer_reviews.author: DAS

customer_reviews.title: Great but NO portrait shots
customer_reviews.text: As the product profile and other reviews indicate, this is a great selfie stick that works as advertised. However, an inherent limitation to the design--and one that I don't believe is described on the product profile--is that it is only capable of landscape shots, not portrait shots (i.e., it can only hold the phone horizontally, not vertically).
customer_reviews.author: George Everlast

customer_reviews.title: I have an 8plus with a case. This didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. Pulled out as far as it would go and I couldn't even get my phone partly in. My phone is pretty large sooooo oh well!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for! :(
customer_reviews.text: Received it this evening and took it out of the package and was showing My mom how the telescopic handle works with my iPhone 7Plus and was collapsing the telescopic handle back down and was pulling the phone out of the clamp holder and it broke. Hadn’t even used it once. And it’s a non returnable item. Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGirl817

customer_reviews.title: Won't Pair with my iPhone X - Also it is NOT RETURNABLE
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a day at the beach. However, it was completely useless. Every time we tried to take a photo, it thought we wanted to re-pair it. When you realize it won't work and try to go through the process to return it, it actually states it's not returnable (even though I just received it this week). Thankfully Amazon was a dream and returned my money. Just beware!
customer_reviews.author: Joyful

customer_reviews.title: Durability is a real concern
customer_reviews.text: [Update - 5th Sep 2019]: 2 more stars for sheer responsiveness of the customer service. The customer service did promptly reach out and offered to replace the faulty stick. Received the new one and it's charging without issue. I am hoping that this one lasts longer than the last one. Will update more after a few days of use. ********** I bought this stick for a trip and it worked fine. Kept it aside and when i took it out for my next trip, it's not working. To be specific, the stick is not switching on, in spite of charging it for hours. I expected this to last, at least, a few trips, if not more. Really disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty worthless, a $4 stick from a street vendor ...
customer_reviews.text: Took on a trip to Europe. It was one a pain to keep it synced via bluetooth to my iPhone. Then it just died and wouldn't sync at all, even after charging. Pretty worthless, a $4 stick from a street vendor with a 3.5mm cord attaching it to the phone worked better. This thing didn't even last for 3 days. UPDATE 1/1/2017 The seller ended up sending me a new stick for free, and without asking. Haven't used it to give it a review since I have a hard wired stick. But they get 5 stars for trying, but still 1 star for the stick until I use it a lot to check it out.
customer_reviews.author: SIGO

customer_reviews.title: A1 Selfie Stick
customer_reviews.text: Great selfie stick. Connectivity is fast and easy, discreet completely retracted and a very STURDY FEEL (so no more trembling and shaking). Take note of pole length - I'm 5'3 and it extends long enough to capture my entire body at the right angle (can't say the same for my 5'9 model friend lol). Nonetheless, great buy!
customer_reviews.author: K.Jae

customer_reviews.title: Great stick for 11 Pro Max
customer_reviews.text: The blue tooth feature works perfectly. The only problems is I noticed a small amount of radial play in the stick when fully extended. I haven't used it enough to see if additional tightening of the extension collar corrects this. The other problem is the iPhone has a protective case and the holding prongs barely open enough to accept the phone. Once in place , the stick functioned well with the phone.
customer_reviews.author: William Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great length....
customer_reviews.text: This selfie stick has great length so it's pretty easy to capture wider shots. Connectivity is good as well. The charging port needs improvement as mine broke after only about a year or so. UPDATE: Upon reading my review, Patozon proactively shipped me a new one to try! Great service and really appreciate the surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong
customer_reviews.text: I loved the concept and its looks great however. I fully charged it and it lasted 10 minutes the first time. Recharged and it lasted 5 minutes the second time. Now it goes dead minutes after turning it on. Disappointed, wanted to reach out to supplier before posting this review but can't find that link.
customer_reviews.author: ecurb57

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Pair with LG V30
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work with LG V30 tried it with 2 different V30's and full charge.
customer_reviews.author: RobCee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold the wireless connection, broke in a month
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a while, but constantly the wireless connection disconnects from the phone. Broke after a month of moderate use. Update: I have to give the company credit for customer service- I had given up on the product and wasn't going to bother to return it, it wasn't worth it. The company saw my review and contacted me with an offer to send a new one, a customer service that is becoming less and less common these days.
customer_reviews.author: zz

customer_reviews.title: Selfie stick won’t pair
customer_reviews.text: Product does not work with my iphone or Samsung Note 8. I had bought this a few months ago and it worked okay with my iPhone but it doesn’t currently pair with my iPhone or a Samsung phone. Update- I contacted customer service regarding the issue and they were very responsive. Unfortunately my selfie stick would not pair and did not seem compatible with my phone. Since the item comes with a product warranty, the seller was willing to give me a refund since my model is not currently in stock for them to provide a replacement. Customer service support team was really friendly, responsive, and helpful! Will reorder a new one with my refund!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Won’t hold my phone case.
customer_reviews.text: Won’t fit an iPhone XR in an Otterbox Defender case. Paired easily with Bluetooth and takes a good picture. Very disappointing because it won’t let me return it.
customer_reviews.author: StaciC

customer_reviews.title: Unusual use for a selfie stick
customer_reviews.text: Used this to help repair an inboard boat engine. The Bluetooth controls worked flawlessly letting me video inspect hard to otherwise reach areas. I needed one with rugged construction and good phone grip to inspect underneath. This stick had what I needed rugged and good phone grip. Made it all possible. I know this isn't what selfie sticks are intended for but it sure worked!
customer_reviews.author: Tony B.

customer_reviews.title: Item changed from last year
customer_reviews.text: This item changed. I purchased this last year and it was great rotated 360 degrees but then it broke. I bought what I thought was the exact same item but when it came in it's completely different than the other one it does not rotate.
customer_reviews.author: fresh

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service and Support, great investment.
customer_reviews.text: Thia ia my rewrite of an eariler review in which I had issues with my first one. I love the concept and easy to set up. But I had an issue with mine after first use. I wrote to customer support and they responded with a replacement selfie stick. Works great, guess mine was a defective one. But at least you can count on their support and product. My other selfie stick that has a flash is great with no issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Won't pair with Note 9 and is not returnable.
customer_reviews.text: Although the description of this SelfieStick says it works with a Galaxy Note 9, it will NOT pair with mine. It is also non-refundable because it contains a flammable battery. Buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Clark

customer_reviews.title: Worst quality!
customer_reviews.text: Have to take it off and on all the time. I wish there’s a better way to put it on and off ————- Update: used it for one trip(two days and the part that holds phone came off! Tried to exchange and it did not let me! Customer service never got back to me. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Dancing flower

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less then 08 days 😡
customer_reviews.text: Everything went perfect but it broke in less then 8 days of use when we went to Europe 😡
customer_reviews.author: Margarita

customer_reviews.title: Great selfie stick/remote control
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I like to take photos that take long to capture. This allows me to capture the photo without shaking the camera on the (separate tripod). Alternatively, I do use it as a selfie stick. It's very well made, and is very sleek. I plan to travel with it because it's so pocket-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Smells so strongly of chemicals.
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how this has so many positive reviews. The product smells so powerfully of plastic chemicals that it cannot possibly be good for you. Once I touched it, the smell was also on my hands. Very strong. I never even used the product - put it in the box and tried to return it. Said Not Returnable. Not sure how I missed that........showed the seller as Amazon so I assumed that was always returnable. Contact Amazon and they did refund the cost. Again - I cannot be the only one to experience this, unless this is somehow a new run.
customer_reviews.author: Air Cork

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging
customer_reviews.text: After a few months it stopped charging. red light is on for days while being charged, blue tooth never connects any more.
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: Even an Old coot can use this one!
customer_reviews.text: It came fast, it was the size I expected, it had clear instruction that even this "Ol' Coot" could follow and is easy to get started and use.. We have enjoyed it now for three extended trips and even a couple patio cameo shots. They all come out fine. Did I mention the ease to use??? dick
customer_reviews.author: Dick Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Does not pair with LG V30
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would pair with my LG V30 but it does not. Description says it pairs with most Android devices, but apparently mine is not one of them. It shows up in my Bluetooth settings, but will not pair. Thought it was an issue with my phone, but I tested it out with other devices and Bluetooth connects with others without an issue. Added a star because it does seem sturdy and high quality. I'm just not able to use it. Trying to return it and I receive an error saying this item isn't eligible for return so I'm currently working with customer service
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Macklin

customer_reviews.title: It wont connect to your Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: it never connect to my phone, we tried it all, nothing worked. I couldn't use it once.
customer_reviews.author: Vro R. Ospina

product_meta.title: Mpow Selfie Stick, Lightweight Extendable 31.9 Inch Monopod with Bluetooth Remote Compatible iPhone SE/11/Pro Max/XS/Max/XR/X/8/8P/7/7P/6S, Galaxy S20/S10/ S10 Plus/S9/8/7/6/Note 10 and More, Blue
feature_bullets: Light and Compact: the most mini and comfortable travel size Selfie stick in 2019! Only 7.1 inches storing length, 4.2 oz Lightweight. Foldable & portable design Fits easily in back pocket, purse, or backpack.

Enjoy quick Bluetooth & Universal fit: just turn it on, pair it with smartphone via quick Bluetooth, you can easily use wireless Selfie stick to take photos or record video. Widely compatible with most mobile phone in the market, (support mobile phones up to 3.3 in wide) For iPhone XS/XS Max/XR/8/8 Plus/7/7 Plus/6/6 Plus, Android Galaxy S10/S9/S9 Plus/S8/S8 Plus/S7/Note 10 /9/ 8 more.

Mpow brand certified: Top-Brand Bluetooth accessories for smartphones. Premium insurance for you: The extra wrist Strap can provide double insurance for the safety of your Mpow iSnap x and your phones.(Note: the selfie stick does not pair with Pixel 2/2 XL.)

Extendable to 31.9 inches & adjustable degree: The Bluetooth Selfie stick 270 degree adjustable head ensures that you can capture a best & beautiful angle when taking selfies. An extendable body of 31.9 inches Maximum length allow you to fit in more people or background to take the most satisfying selfies.

Popular & fashion gift: with built-in Bluetooth remote control & Great battery, Mpow selfie stick allows you to take selfies or group photos easily with a better photo sight. It also a fashion gift for your family, lover and friends.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars13,649 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
